newsitem.title: UK: FTSE 100 pushes to yet another record on Dow gain.
newsitem.headline: FTSE 100 pushes to yet another record on Dow gain.

text.p: The FTSE 100 index of leading UK shares powered to yet another record high early on Friday, led by a strong Dow close and continuing stock shortages, dealers said.
The index was 16.5 points ahead at 4,596.9 by 0744 GMT, having touched 4,602, and breaking through last night's all-time high close.
Bullish sentiment surrounding Britain's new Labour government also helped support the gain, dealers said.
"We have bids and all sorts of euphoria. Just the sort of thing that happens close to the top of a bull market," said Charterhouse Tilney head of research, Richard Jeffrey.
